name: Just Die
description:
Kill Your Self To Use Your Dead Body To Win

!"the browser version may not be stable"!

a simple game made for the "WOWIE Jam 3.0" i hope you like it

Controls:

  • A/D or Arrow keys to Move
  • Space to Jump
  • X/R to Restart Level

Credit:

I made everything except the Music :)

Music made by Tallbeard Studios
